text: Donald James "Donny" Lucas is a Canadian actor and comedian, best known for voicing Disco Kid in Punch Out!!, Zed in League of Legends, Mr. Fix in Iron Man: Armored Adventures, and the Lucius Fox A.I. in Batwoman. He voiced Boog in Open Season: Scared Silly (2015). Category:Living people Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Actors from Montreal
title: Donny Lucas
